name: Protectors of The Realm
description:
Play as one of the elite knights known as the Draakor Riders from the galactic empire known as Talaa’tch. An empire made up of multiple species from various social classes. Your task is defending the capital planet from the invaders, which have been causing the empire trouble in many other planets for a period of time now, ranging from acts of terrorism to destroying entire cities. Intel suggests that they are unleashing the majority of their forces on the capital. So defeating them here would most likely quench their attacks for good.

Note: the game in it's current state is very unfinished and isn't worth playing rn I finish it this week.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow keys: Movement
Space or Left mouse Button: Shoot

Game was made in Godot engine.
Sprites made by Free and Premium Game Assets (GUI, Sprite, Tilesets)
https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-enemy-spaceship-2d-sprites-pixel-art

Music used: Camille Saint-Saëns: Danse Macabre by Kevin MacLeodhttps://freemusicarchive.org/music/Kevin_MacLeod/Classical_Sampler/Danse_Macabre

This is a late submission for the YUdum #2 game jam. Admittedly doing this while I have a lot of things to take care of irl is not a wise choice but I still wanted to do it. This is the third game I ever made. And while progress has been slow there is progress in my skill.
